Forums

Questions

When will my order get delivered?

Your delivery will be done within the next 2 days of you ordering.

How fresh is my product?

The item which you order gets delivered from the nearest accesible farm around you, ensuring completely fresh products!

How do you help farmers?

We directly collaborate with farms, and deliver products right from thr farmers to you, eliminating any middle-men. This ensures that our farmers get the income they deserve.

Can I get a refund?

Sorry. We do not take refunds after ordering, since it comprimises our commitment to deliver fresh products.
